name: Microsoft Word
pre_uninstall_scripts:
remove_pkg_files_prepare() {
  local PKGID="$1"
  local TMPFILE="$2"
  local INSTALL_LOCATION
  INSTALL_LOCATION=$(pkgutil --pkg-info-plist "$PKGID" | awk '/<key>install-location<\/key>/ {getline; gsub(/.*<string>|<\/string>.*/, ""); print}')
  echo sudo pkgutil --files "$PKGID"
  sudo pkgutil --files "$PKGID" | sed "s|^|/${INSTALL_LOCATION}/|" | tr '\n' '\0' > "$TMPFILE"
}
